features.featureTitle: Replace the currently displayed logo image (the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/img[1]) with a new PNG logo based on the referenced Freepik design, and ensure the new PNG is the one rendered by the app wherever that selected logo image is shown.

Adjust styling of the selected container element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]/div[1] so that its rendered size appears slightly larger than the YouTube player element on the same screen (i.e., increase the containerâ€™s visual prominence by increasing its effective width/height and/or padding/margins while keeping layout stable).
